{{Infobox Oak Item |name = Poison Barb |image = [[File:Bag_Poison_Barb_Sprite.png]] |caption = Artwork of the ''Poison Barb''. |dex = 40 |effect = Clicks do more damage }} The '''Poison Barb''' is a type of Oak item. When equipped, it increases the damage of clicks. ==Details== ===Description=== Clicks do more damage. ===Acquisition=== Catch 40 Unique Pok√©mon. ===Effects=== Level 0: x1.25 Click Damage, Level 1: x1.3 Click Damage, Level 2: x1.35 Click Damage, Level 3: x1.4 Click Damage, Level 4: x1.45 Click Damage, Level 5/MAX: x1.5 Click Damage, ===Upgrade Requirements=== Level 0 to 1 167 clicks and 50,000 Pokedollars {{Oak items}}
